author: Mister Hughes.
comment: Is this for watching videos or for using as a remote? Because trying to do both is just weird. Since this former video player started doing two things badly instead of one thing well, I can no longer delete videos, and the rotate button only rotates clockwise, or back again. Just plain stupid.

author: Dirk McNicoll
comment: Please, please, please make the remote a default opening setting! Most annoying thing on this app is it opens to My Library yet that function doesn't work! I just want the remote!

author: jacob clements
comment: It's a great app, but it does have occasional annoying glitches where by nothing will play whatsoever. I've been trying all day to sort but cannot yet. It has happened before so hopefully will sort itself out. Other that that it's great and very useful for casting onto any home tv

author: Kamal Kanth P R
comment: We just need a good remote and to control our TV and watch movies, shows in it. Please stop recommending videos in this app. Just remove that section, it's really annoying and really making the app slow when opening and connecting to TV

author: Demian Reyes
comment: It doesn't allow me to go past the first screen. After I agree terms I get the following "could not acquire channel list". The only option is "retry" and nothing happens.

comment: Why is this app necessary to use the video application? Bollocks.

author: Gokul priyan
comment: In old Xperia Video (Movie) app is better then this, Cannot play continuously one by one videos😡😡😠 In folder its more angry 😡 to play a videos, to select a video then select play icon to play,then after playing to go back and select another video and touch play icon to play  it's really hate to use this app 😠😠  Plz Plz give few features like to swipe to change next video in home and folder areas 😕😔😧 Sony didn't changed or gives any new features in this video application  In Xperia this is default video app we want to few new features to easily use Plz Sony we need some improvement 😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔

author: Inder Mohan Singh
comment: Good app. With nice interface.I have 2android tv of same model.It is difficult to decide which one to control.Both tv are shown as 43w800d.Any  solution to assign different name to both tv's.Thanks.

comment: Stopped connecting to home network on my new phone however still works on my old phone strange

comment: When are you going to fix translation of My library in croiatin language? It is not Boja knjižnica, it is Moja knjižnica. Please fix this. Popravite više prijevod od My library. Treba biti Moja knjižnica, a ne Boja knjižnica kako sad piše.

author: Matthew Castillo
comment: This would get a 5 star if it became strictly a remote app and it can connect to google assistant, aka voice command your Sony google tv to turn on / off, change channels, etc. I think the whole video capability of the app is just off and useless. Please remove it.
App works great on old phone. New phone won't work. Keeps telling me cannot squire channel list
